channel.title: Data Packets on 0x000216

item.title: Increase Bandwidth Without Increasing Costs
item.description:
Companies need more bandwidth, especially for their wide area networks (WANs), but it can be very expensive. While high speeds are affordable within a company’s LAN, connecting to the outside world traditionally comes with much higher costs. This is because WAN connections were typically provided by telecom companies using technology initially meant for phone services. While more modern providers have entered the market with updated infrastructure, even traditional providers are adapting to the demand for data services...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/increase-bandwidth-without-increasing-costs/

item.title: Insatiable Demand For Ethernet Bandwidth
item.description:
10 Gbps used to be a bandwidth amount so large that only major telecommunications companies needed it. That’s no longer true, as businesses are now using that much WAN bandwidth and wanting even more. Beyond internet providers, who could need 10 Gbps? According to Carrier Ethernet News, the finance, streaming entertainment, and medical industries are leading the demand for high bandwidth. Some are even hoping for 40 Gbps and 100 Gbps!..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/insatiable-demand-for-ethernet-bandwidth/
